content: I work at PT. Panca Karya Kayoe in the Human Resources section from Dec 2021 - Oct 2022.
jobdesc1: ● Manage employee data and other employee needs (BPJS Kes, jamsostek, salary, interview, employee termination and others).
jobdesc2: ● Maintain employee discipline following the rules set by management, maintain order in the surrounding environment with the company or with fellow employees.

content: I did an internship at the Mechatronics Laboratory of the Malang State Polytechnic from December 2020 - Feb 2021.
jobdesc1: ● Control operator and maintenance system 2mx2mx2m 3D Printing (maintenance which includes a microcontroller, replacement of damaged components, 3D machine calibration).
jobdesc2: ● Making an innovation of alarm system when the power source was gone the bell ringing, and microcontroller has supplied electric with accu.
